name: Metano
description:
In this game you are what they call a Holo . You have been trapped in a gamelike dimension. Now your goal is to Escape it or Survive it.

Genre: Fighting Parkour Sci fi

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

How to install: Unzip the .zip file somewhere and the file you want to open to run the game is called Metano.exe or just Metano.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
